page.title: 16FISHING-HOLKER MOSS
page.content: The fishing on the lower{River Leven is owned and controlled by Holker Estates who employ a water baliff to manage it.The{Lower Leven Angling {Association}lease the fishing rights. The main fishing is for{Trout,Sea- {Trout and Salmon}which may be caught by fly or spinner.Trout are resident in the river all year and may be caught between 16th May and 1st October.The sea-trout and salmon can be caught from 1st March to 31st October. The sea-trout and salmon run up river to spawn.They do not spawn in the river but in{Lake Windermere.}The sea- trout average about 1.5 lbs in weight. The salmon are much bigger at around 6 or 7 lbs.The Lower Leven Angling Association waters start below Low Wood bridge and run on downstream into the estuary.
